REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1592 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-DEF 03-16 0062

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET DEFICIT FORECAST REVISED UPWARDS
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it had revised its estimate of the shortage in the money market today up to 1.15 billion stg before taking account of its early operations. Earlier, the bank forecast the deficit at 1.05 billion stg and gave 90 mln stg assistance at an early round of bill offers. REUTER
